testsuite.name: Shader Quality Gate
testsuite.testcase:
<failure message="[ERROR naga::valid::compose] Vector component[0] type Scalar(Scalar { kind: Uint, width: 4 }), building Scalar { kind: Sint, width: 4 } [0m[1m[38;5;9merror[0m[1m: Entry point main at Compute is invalid[0m [0m[36mâ”Œâ”€[0m .temp_lightFieldComposer.wgsl:69:61 [0m[36mâ”‚[0m [0m[36m69[0m [0m[36mâ”‚[0m let baseColor: vec4 = textureLoad(baseTex, [0m[31mvec2(local_x, local_y)[0m, i32(viewIndex), 0); [0m[36mâ”‚[0m [0m[31m^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^[0m [0m[31mnaga::ir::Expression [51][0m [0m[36mâ”‚[0m [0m[36m=[0m Expression [51] is invalid [0m[36m=[0m Composing 0's component type is not expected
" type="NAGA_VALIDATION">NAGA_VALIDATION: [ERROR naga::valid::compose] Vector component[0] type Scalar(Scalar { kind: Uint, width: 4 }), building Scalar { kind: Sint, width: 4 } [0m[1m[38;5;9merror[0m[1m: Entry point main at Compute is invalid[0m [0m[36mâ”Œâ”€[0m .temp_lightFieldComposer.wgsl:69:61 [0m[36mâ”‚[0m [0m[36m69[0m [0m[36mâ”‚[0m let baseColor: vec4<f32> = textureLoad(baseTex, [0m[31mvec2<i32>(local_x, local_y)[0m, i32(viewIndex), 0); [0m[36mâ”‚[0m [0m[31m^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^[0m [0m[31mnaga::ir::Expression [51][0m [0m[36mâ”‚[0m [0m[36m=[0m Expression [51] is invalid [0m[36m=[0m Composing 0's component type is not expected
